title: Mellowed Us Out
author: Lavender
citation: Lavender. "Mellowed Us Out: experience with Lavandula spp. (Lavender), Cocaine & Alcohol (ID 64403)". Erowid.org. Dec 30, 2009. erowid.org/exp/64403
report: During our night of partying we realized we had no ganja! We had consumed a considerable amount of cocaine. I had two shots and two glasses of champagne. I had just bought a lavendar plant a few days before. My friend suggested smoking it for some odd ball reason, and silly me I was so down to try! We all had small snaps out of our bong. It tasted delightful, a delicious after taste. I wasn't really sure of the effects but everyone agreed that it mellowed us out.
